data.text: @WGONnews @stevanzetti But go ahead and trust your big tech overlords to protect you from “misinformation” and “dangerous” websites 🤡 https://t.co/gh4PE8yqOV

@WGONnews @stevanzetti You do know the US surgeon general called on big tech to censor information that doesn’t fit the narrative right?  If you really think this isn’t happening, you’re either lying to yourself or you’re the most gullible person on the planet.

@tysonzahner @stevanzetti Twitter: "My god! If the word gets out that ivermectin cures/prevents/reverses/whatever-the-fuck Covid then our entire plan/deception/viral attack/what-the-fuck-ever is ruined! Quick! Make it so https://t.co/iQGner2Urp is flagged as malicious!

Hurry!"
@WGONnews @stevanzetti Lol - are you under the impression that Twitter doesn’t purposefully censor information and sites they don’t want people to see?  If so, you’re more gullible than I thought.
@tysonzahner @stevanzetti You mean the site that Twitter literally warned might contain malicious software?

@JonDelany1 @stevanzetti When you dig deeper into the data YOUR STUDY shows a 60% reduction in patients requiring ventilation, a 30% reduction in ICU admission, and a 70% REDUCTION IN ALL CAUSE HOSPITAL MORTALITY.

Thanks for giving me yet another RCT that proves IVM works 👍🏻 https://t.co/D9KJto7q85

@WGONnews @stevanzetti Hey moron, attack the RCTs if you have a problem with them, not the site they’re complied on. 

Your weak, intellectually lazy ad hom attacks are transparent and laughable.

@JonDelany1 @stevanzetti Out of just 490 patients in your i-tech study, 241 got Ivermectin & 331 were vaccinated (in other words there was overlap)

When we compute vax effectiveness AGAINST DEATH and IVM effectiveness AGAINST DEATH, we see that IVM actually prevented more deaths. https://t.co/D5Jd42H0Ie
